channel.title: NPC Death
channel.description: I'm a noob to server development and stuff but I was wondering if anyone could help me out with a problem in my server. My monsters don't die..when they go to 0 hp they like automatically reset there hp back to full hp and continue to attack me. If anyone can help that would be very much appreciated. :)

item.title: NPC Death
item.dc:creator: @Darthmetroid Darthmetroid
item.description:
@Darthmetroid wrote:

Okay, tyvm guys

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Death
item.dc:creator: @toonshorty toonshorty
item.description:
@toonshorty wrote:

yes sometimes in servers in the NPC.cfg file the NPC’s health is 0… so it never dies!

just change the 0 to the max HP and it will die!

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Death
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

[quote=“bed240, post:2, topic:140412”]yep this ocures offten normaly in high lvl npc’s i think im not to sure how to fix but im guesin u can try and chnage their hp or something in “npc.cgf”

but im not to sure[/quote]
You’re correct.
Change their HP in npc.cfg to something in the range of the max HP you can have.

Read full topic
